name: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite
description: Most cost-efficient Gemini model with same speed as 1.5 Flash but better quality. Ideal for high-volume applications requiring good performance at minimal cost.
notes: Cheapest Gemini API access at $0.10/1M input, $0.40/1M output. Supports 1M token context. Can caption ~40,000 photos for under $1. Generally available as stable model.
